text: Yunost Stadium (or Zhastar Stadium in Kazakh:) () is a sports stadium in Oral, Kazakhstan. The stadium is used for the home games of bandy team Akzhaiyk. Starting in the 2017–18 season, the stadium was supposed to have an artificial ice surface. It got delayed but in 2018 it was officially ready for use. ==Sources== Category:Bandy venues in Kazakhstan Category:Sport in Oral
title: Yunost Stadium (Oral)
